title: SealedBox
description: Sealed Box that contains the encrypted vault. The SealedBox is generated by the vault provider and transmitted to the Vault receiver.

publicKey.description: Public Key of the Vault provider used to share the vault content symmetric key with the vault receiver.

encryptedVault.description: Encrypted Vault using with shared key between vault receiver and provider. In the format of `encryptedData || authenticationTag`

keyDerivationSalt.description: Salt used for symmetric key derivation.

encryptionNonce.description: Nonce used in the encryption of the vault
